articles.title: Art Rooney II Opposes Flexing Thursday Games, In Favor Of Up To Two TNF Games Per Team - Steelers Depot
articles.description: The NFL is looking to expand its Thursday Night Football schedule. It wants to allow teams to have two Thursday games per year, rather than having only one. That seems likely to happen. There is much less support—and some vocal opposition—behind the notion of…

articles.title: Knicks can gain firm control in battle for No. 5 seed with win over Heat - New York Post
articles.description: If the Knicks want to take firm control of the fifth-place seed in which they reside, a win over the Heat will be critical.
articles.content:
In a marathon NBA campaign, games can blur together, but over their next two games, the Knicks can put a stamp on their regular season and spread hope for the postseason.
